name: maven-hosted-snapshots
content: import org.sonatype.nexus.blobstore.api.BlobStoreManager;import org.sonatype.nexus.repository.storage.WritePolicy;import org.sonatype.nexus.repository.maven.VersionPolicy;import org.sonatype.nexus.repository.maven.LayoutPolicy;repository.createMavenHosted('maven-hosted-snapshots', BlobStoreManager.DEFAULT_BLOBSTORE_NAME, true, VersionPolicy.SNAPSHOT, WritePolicy.ALLOW, LayoutPolicy.STRICT);
